references.reference: i have worked with Kristi on several different occasions in different positions he has held. when it came time there seems that he have to work with on difficult things possible., it has been an honor and a pleasure to work with bret of his team and technical expertise. he is a great person and a great team player who takes his commitment to work and is hard at work. he is a dedicated individual with solid it knowledge., trent is a skilled and natural software engineer who is a solid. he is very oriented person in solving some people out of his., i worked with Kristi for several years and during that time always found him to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. he is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. when asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Kristi delivered without hesitation and with excellent execution, even if projects were outside of his immediate role. i would highly recommend Kristi for his positive character as a member of any creative team.
